mean_en: a social and economic system in which there is no private ownership and the means of production belong to all political doctrine or movement that aims to establish
word_etyma: commun公社 + ism名词后缀：...主义 → communism 共产主义
sentence: The idea of communism was first introduced by Karl Marx.
sentence_trans: 卡尔·马克思是传播共产主义思想的第一人。
